Any movement is typically identified and processed on a rolling basis as late withdrawals/declines are confirmed and finalized. If an opening is confirmed at any point, we will re-check capacity and review eligible candidates in accordance with our admissions priorities, and then contact students directly for a time-sensitive response.

No additional step is required from you right now. Please continue monitoring your email and phone closely so you can respond quickly if contacted.
